name: Global Conference on Business Management and Social Sciences
content: “Global Conference on Business Management and Social Sciences (GCBMS-2018)” is an effort Academy of Business Management Conferences (ABMC), scheduled on 21st – 22nd September, Dubai, United Arab Emirates (UAE). With an ambition to transform ideas into reality, at GCBMS academia and industry will be together to exchange futuristic research direction and stipulation. Through networking and discussion at GCBMS-2018 academic experts and industry professionals can move ahead in applied research in addition to academic research.
